CustomField.description: AD-307 - text field to show the Service Summary of the Opportunity
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Automotive"), "Automotive; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Biomedical Management Services"), "Biomedical Management Services; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Car Park Management"), "Car Park Management; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Catering"), "Catering; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Cleaning"), "Cleaning; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Compliance Services"), "Compliance Services; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Hard Services"), "Hard Services; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Horticulture"), "Horticulture; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Industrial Painting"), "Industrial Painting; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "IoT"), "IoT; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Management Services"), "Management Services; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Other"), "Other; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Pest Control"), "Pest Control; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "PRM"), "PRM; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Security"), "Security; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Soft Services"), "Soft Services; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Strategic Consulting"), "Strategic Consulting; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Technical"), "Technical; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "TFM"), "TFM; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "VAS Specialized Services"), "VAS Specialized Services; ", null) & IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Service_Summary__c, "Waste Management"), "Waste Management; ", null)
CustomField.label: Product Summary
